question:
The Constitution confers extraordinary powers on the President to deal with which of the following types of emergencies?
1. National Emergency
2. President’s Rule 
3. Financial Emergency
4. Climate Emergency
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Constitution of India confers extraordinary powers on the President to deal with three types of emergencies, that is, (1) National Emergency (Article 352); (2)  President’s Rule (Article 356 & 365); and (3)Financial Emergency (Article 360).
